Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Golden Dolphin Way, just north of the great City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The vast City Walls have been the protectors of Oceancrest for as long as anyone can remember. On the north side of the road, you can see the Farmer's Federation Building, where the farmers all gather to discuss local politics and how it will adversly affect their well-being. The farmer's lobby is one of the most powerful political units in Oceancrest and should not be taken lightly.
